articles.title: Congratulations to New French PM
articles.content:
Congratulations to New French PM
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim sent a congratulatory message to Jeam-Marc Ayrault upon his appointment as prime minister of France on Tuesday.
					 The message wished him success in his work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged Not to Abuse Ro's Return for Its Political Purpose: Press Release
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged Not to Abuse Ro's Return for Its Political Purpose: Press Release 
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The North and South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on Tuesday made public the following joint press release:
					 Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, will return to south Korea through Panmunjom on July 5. He came to Pyongyang on March 24 to express condolences on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il, a big loss to the nation, as a compatriot. 
					
					 His Pyongyang visit is a token of due courtesy observed to share the sadness of the nation with the fellow countrymen in the north. It is also a righteous deed in view of traditional beautiful manners and customs of the Korean nation and the spirit of national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The south Korean "government" authorities, however, kept south Korean people from all walks of life from expressing condolences over the loss to the nation in December last year and are now threatening to arrest Ro Su Hui upon his return, terming his Pyongyang visit "illegal". 
					
					 The anti-reunification conservative forces in south Korea are going to use Ro's return as a pretext for eliminating the progressive pro-reform forces through the "coloring offensive" against "forces following the north" and providing a political situation in favor of the upcoming "presidential" election for staying in power. 
					
					 We solemnly declare that all the Koreans will never pardon the south Korean "government" authorities if they arrest Ro on the charges of the violation of the outdated "Security Law" and use his return for their political purpose, intensifying the frantic confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 The North and South Headquarters of Pomminryon will as ever share pleasure and sadness with fellow countrymen and devote all to achieving national reunification with concerted efforts of the Korean nation, despite of any difficulties and ordeals. 
					
					 We ardently call upon all the Koreans at home and abroad to fully support and welcome Ro's Pyongyang visit and return through Panmunjom, strongly condemn the south Korean authorities' plan to arrest him and pool efforts to implement the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of S. HQ of Pomminryon Ro Su Hui Interviewed
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of S. HQ of Pomminryon Interviewed 
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), was interviewed by KCNA at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday before going back  to the south after wrapping up his itinerary in the north.
					 He said that he visited Pyongyang to take part in the memorial service on the lapse of 100 days after the demise of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 The South Headquarters of Pomminryon decided to pay visit to the north to express condolences before the bier of the chairman of the National Defence Commission and make a contribution, though small, to improving the deteriorated inter-Korean relations. It presented an application for Pyongyang visit to the "Ministry of Unification" of south Korea, but it was turned down. 
					
					 Therefore, according the decision of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon I had to come to Pyongyang via a third country despite the authorities' disallowance. 
					
					 I took part in the celebrations of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung held amid great attention of the world, the event marking the June 1 International Children's Day and other grand events. I visited the secret camp in Mt. Paektu, Mt. Kumgang area, Huichon Power Station No. 2, newly built Changjon Street, factories, rural areas, cities and villages. 
					
					 While in the north I have felt that the north where the leader and the people form a harmonious whole will surely build a thriving nation thanks to political stability and strong economic potential. 
					
					 In the north the people are regarded as Heaven, children as kings and the single-minded unity is stronger than nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The fellow countrymen in the north trust in and follow the supreme commander as their father as he is pursuing politics of love for the people and posterity, believing in them as in Heaven. 
					
					 They do not allow anyone to defame the dignity of the supreme leadership even a bit. 
					
					 Everybody I met here was full of confidence and hope and ardently desired national reunification. 
					
					 Expressing his will to struggle to the last against the conservative authorities who are going to bring unreasonable charges against him, he noted:
					
					 As I feel no compunction before the nation and history, I am going to go back to the south via Panmunjom on July 5 after winding up my itinerary. 
					
					 I intend to tell everything I have seen, heard and experienced in the north to people who were taken in by the conservative media's propaganda and accuse the anti-reunification forces of their crimes. 
					
					 I will devote myself to the struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a shortcut to national reconciliation, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Woman Interviewed upon Her Return Home (4)
articles.content:
DPRK Woman Interviewed upon Her Return Home (4) 
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK woman Pak Jong Suk was interviewed by Korean and foreign reporters on June 28.
					 She returned home after being taken away to south Korea.
					
					 She laid bare the truth behind the rackets over "defectors from the north" kicked up by the south Korean puppet regime, and their miserable plight.
					
					 She said that now the south Korean "government" authorities are using "defectors" in their anti-DPRK campaign over "human rights in the north".
					
					 She went on: 
					
					 The defectors are dirty human scum who harbor grudge against the DPRK system or committed crimes in the DPRK before fleeing it. They are desperately escalating confrontation with the DPRK for getting some money in return for pleasing the south Korean conservative group. 
					
					 Now the south Korean "government" authorities leave no stone unturned in their anti-DPRK propaganda. Those disguised as "red cross organization" and "volunteering servants" allure "defectors from the north" with money and let them make invectives slandering the DPRK and justifying south Korean society and even stage demonstrations chanting anti-DPRK slogans. People do not want to go there because they are aware that they were aimed to abet anti-DPRK confrontation with false stories and fabrications and they often ended up in chaos. That is why the authorities cook up such methods as alluring the defectors with money. 
					
					 One time south Korean media loudly asserted that "defectors from the north" who went to China were taken back to the north. Later, it was disclosed that the authorities cooked up the story for anti-DPRK propaganda by using the names of those who went abroad unable to live in south Korea or were already dead. 
					
					 Asked how they came to south Korea, one man said that he was allured by a lump sum and expensive materials at a restaurant and another said that he went to a toilet being drunken and somebody threatened him to go to south Korea. There was even a man who said he was tempted by women. There were many other reasons. 
					
					 In fact, the worst human rights abuser is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group. 
					
					 The Lee group is now persistently vociferating about the issue of "defectors" and making desperate efforts to defame the DPRK by use of human scum. But, it is a foolish action.

articles.title: KCNA Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
KCNA Delegation Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Central News Agency led by Director General Kim Pyong Ho left here on Tuesday to take part in the 2nd world media summit to be held in Moscow.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea led by Kim Wan Su, director of the Secretariat of the Committee, left here on Tuesday to visit Vietnam and Laos.

articles.title: DPRK Qualifies AFC U-22 Soccer Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Qualifies AFC U-22 Soccer Championship
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK and Chinese soccer teams tied 1-1 Tuesday in a Group F preliminary match of the AFC U-22 Soccer Championship, coming first in the group and qualifying for the soccer championship.

articles.title: Newcomer to Changjon Street Overcome with Happiness
articles.content:
Newcomer to Changjon Street Overcome with Happiness
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- KCNA had an interview with a woman who moved into a new house in Taedongmun-dong, Changjon Street which the dear respected Kim Jong Un visited prior to its completion.
					 The large house was furnished with all living conditions.
					
					 The householder, Hong Sun Hui, said:
					
					 "As an ordinary tailor's cutter, I had never dreamed of living in such nice house.
					
					 My fellows and relatives have come here to see the new house, congratulating me on this luck.
					
					 It is my high honor and happiness to take this house which the dear respected Kim Jong Un visited."
					
					 At that time, her mother-in-law Won Kum Suk, 88, living in Ryugyong-dong No. 1, Pothonggang District, came into the house.
					
					 The grandmother said she was grateful to Kim Jong Un for the new house provided to her son's family.

articles.title: Fashionable Service Facilities Built in Changjon Street
articles.content:
Fashionable Service Facilities Built in Changjon Street
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Service facilities built in a fashionable way in Changjon Street are in good harmony with their nearby high-rises.
					 Among them are Unjong Teahouse and Songyong and Haemaji restaurants, which are flawless from the architectural and aesthetic point of view. They are also wonderful from the formative art point of view.
					
					 All of the buildings are covered with tinted glasses.
					
					 Lights from chandeliers give cubic effects to walls, floors and ceilings of the buildings.
					
					 Flower and sundry goods shops, studio and other service buildings are located in a well-assorted way on either side of the main road.
					
					 Each residential quarter has a public bath, barbershop, beauty salon, laundry, etc. 
					
					 All of the service facilities were built with priority given to people's convenience.

articles.title: Single-minded Unity in DPRK, Legacy Left by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Single-minded Unity in DPRK, Legacy Left by Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons and civilians of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now speeding up the advance in the new century of Juche by dint of their single-minded unity around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 This single-minded unity is a precious legacy bequeathed by leader Kim Jong Il who succeeded to the cause of President Kim Il Sung, and it serves as an eternal treasure for the victory of Songun Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, regarding the single-minded unity as the mainstay of the revolution, paid primary attention to cementing the unity all his life.
					
					 In the 1970s, he rallied the entire party and army and all the people under the banner of modeling whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					 He used to say that there should be a centre for the unity and cohesion as all things in the universe were formed on the basis of their nucleus and move around it. This centre is just a leader and unity should be based on the leader's idea. It was his steadfast faith and will.
					
					 Kim Jong Il steadily built up the organizational and ideological bases of the ranks in the DPRK, adhering to the theory that a leader is the centre of social community.
					
					 He strengthened into the main force of the revolution the Korean People's Army whom any other group of society can not match in loyalty to the party and the leader and in the sense of organization and discipline.
					
					 Under his wise guidance, the KPA grew up to be the full-fledged main force of the revolution, displaying its features in consolidating the single-minded unity.
					
					 Comradeship is the basis for the close unity of the leader, party, army and people that form one community united by destiny.
					
					 The garden of comradeship cultivated by Kim Jong Il is now coming into full bloom under the care of Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the DPRK.
					
					 Following the comradeship displayed by the great persons, many people unhesitatingly dedicated their lives to saving their comrades from danger. Among them were heroes Pak Thae Son and Ri Chang Son, who were ordinary miner and peasant.
					
					 Irrespective of age, social background and career, all the people share the same destiny, reliably carrying forward the tradition of unity under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: "Our Great Country" Sings of DPRK's Pride
articles.content:
"Our Great Country" Sings of DPRK's Pride
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- "Our Great Country", a song created in the late 1990s, inspires the people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with a pride of living in a great country.
					 The song tells about the dignity of the DPRK, which has emerged a socialist power thanks to leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 For weak national might, Korea had been put under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and its people had lived like slaves. 
					
					 The history left a lesson that a country is doomed to be ruined, if it is misled by a leader.
					
					 The song's refrain says that led by Kim Jong Il the DPRK is great, showing that the country shining with his august name is a powerful nation, though its territory is not large.
					
					 The song is allamarcia, with its melody characterized by dynamic rhythm and diverse artistic features.

articles.title: Way-Out for U.S. Is to Repeal Hostile Policy to DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Way-Out for U.S. Is to Repeal Hostile Policy to DPRK: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean authorities staged a large-scale combined naval mobile drill from June 23 to 25.
					 Involved in the drill was a nuclear aircraft carrier flotilla under the pretext of "increasing the ability to cope with invasion" by the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The drill was aimed to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers staged live shell firing drill, targeting the flag of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the U.S. ambition to invade the DPRK by force of arms to establish the military domination over the Korean Peninsula and, on the basis of it, hold an unchallenged edge in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. has made desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK, far from opting for coexistence with it. Therefore, clear is an option to be followed by the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK can not but bolster up the nuclear deterrent for self-defence in order to preserve its sovereignty and dignity and ensure the peace and stability on the peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK would lead to tightened countermeasure by the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S., which dreams of the world domination by dint of nuclear weapons, should clearly understand about the DPRK's countermeasure for self-defense.
					
					 We warn once again that the way-out for the U.S. is to abandon the hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Group of Traitors for Spoiling Reunification Programme
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams S. Korean Regime for Spoiling Reunification Programme
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea is a band of die-hard anti-reunification elements who ditched the reunification programme common to the nation.
					 The Lee group of traitors talked about the implementation of the July 4 Joint Statement in the early period of its office. But this was nothing but a fraud and deception.
					
					 During the tenure of its office, the group pushed the inter-Korean relations to the lowest ebb, blatantly challenging the historic July 4 Joint Statement and the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity enshrined in the inter-Korean declarations, the embodiment of the joint statement.
					
					 The issue of the country's reunification is an internal matter of the nation which rules out any interference of foreign forces.
					
					 The Lee group has paved the way for dependence on outsiders from the early period of its office, contrary to the principle of independence.
					
					 Regarding the inter-Korean relations as diplomatic relations, the group has considered it as its "diplomacy with the north" and "policy toward the north" to carry out the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It drastically slashed the "Ministry of Unification" which was allegedly supervising the issue of north-south relations and increased the function of the "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade". It posted maniacs keen on confrontation with the fellow countrymen to the above-said ministries, inciting them to float the issues arising in relations between the north and the south in the U.S. or Japan and staging anti-reunification acts.
					
					 The group challenged the spirit of the July 4 Joint Statement which called for achieving multifaceted exchange between the north and the south and promoting bilateral interests.
					
					 It totally denied the improvement of the relations, unhesitatingly saying that it is ready to keep the inter-Korean relations frozen to the end of its office.
					
					 The group slandered the DPRK's proposal for broad negotiations with such outcries as "no sincerity can be seen" and "it may be a tactic", thus banning even humanitarian cooperation.
					
					 The Lee group hurt the social system in the DPRK, being hell-bent on the racket for confrontation between social systems, contrary to the inter-Korean agreements and commitments.
					
					 It hatched such a hideous plot as a warship sinking case, not content with holding exercises for a war against the DPRK almost every day under the pretext of coping with "contingency". It has escalated confrontation with compatriots while crying out for "punishment" and "retaliation."
					
					 It went the lengths of perpetrating such thrice-cursed unethical acts of rubbing salt into the wounds of the nation who suffered the greatest loss, and hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, its lifeline.
					
					 Treacherous acts and anti-reunification crimes committed by the group of traitors by totally negating the reunification programme common to the nation and inter-Korean declarations put the crimes by the successive south Korean fascist dictators into the shade.
					
					 Neither improved inter-Korean relations nor national reunification, cherished desire of Koreans, are possible as long as the Lee group and other forces standing in the way of reunification are allowed to stay in power.
					
					 All Koreans should eliminate the group of traitors and achieve the historic cause of national reunification by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Halt Move to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Halt Move to Conclude Military Agreement with Japan 
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea, on June 30 released an article in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak regime's attempt to conclude a military agreement with Japan, a war criminal state.
					 The article said that Japan imposed a holocaust of war upon the peoples in the Asia-Pacific including the Koreans and committed human rights abuses that baffled human imagination.
					
					 This notwithstanding, Japan has refused to admit, repent, apologize and make reparation for its war crimes well-known in the world, the article noted. It, instead, has justified its crimes by distorting history. 
					
					 The Lee regime, aligned with Japan, is set to provide a legal means for Japan in its effort to emerge as a military giant and pave a way for its intervention in the military affairs of the peninsula, the article added, calling it foolish and dangerous move.
					
					 It urged the "government" authorities to properly understand the people's mind-set, not just taking the public opinion opposed to the conclusion of the agreement for anti-Japanese feelings.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Authorities Drop Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Authorities Drop Conclusion of Military Agreement with Japan
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore in an editorial on June 30 demanded the "government" authorities drop the conclusion of a military agreement with Japan.
					 The danger of a military information agreement, GSOMIA, with Japan sought by the "government" was brought to light, the editorial said, calling for its total abrogation.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 As regards the conclusion of the agreement, the "government" raised the unreasonable "excuses". The public skepticism has grown over the purpose and the process of concluding the agreement.
					
					 Japan has not yet abandoned the ambition to invade the Korean Peninsula but stepped up the moves to equip the "Self-defense Forces" with nuclear weapons, being engrossed in distortion of history, far from making an apology and reparation for its past wrongdoings. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak and Chongwadae can not pass the buck for seeking to conclude the military agreement with Japan.

articles.title: Ensuring Workers' Right to Existence Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ensuring Workers' Right to Existence Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in Seoul on June 28 urging the "government" authorities to guarantee workers' right to existence.
					 Present there were more than 40 000 including those from the women's union, metal trade union and construction trade union which are affiliated to the Confederation and members of the opposition party.
					
					 At the rally the speakers deplored the workers' right to existence being violated by the authorities' unjust lay-off and expansion of part-time jobs.
					
					 They urged the authorities to repeal all evil labor laws including the one on part-time jobs and opt to revise the labor laws for ensuring the right of the workers.
					
					 They vowed to fight it out against the authorities' pro-plutocrats policy.
					
					 A resolution was read out at the rally.
					
					 Increasing is the number of workers being expelled from the working sites after working extra hours with low pay, it deplored.
					
					 It said that by giving full vent to the wrath of the workers, they would certainly realize the desire of the people: "We can live no more, let's change the regime!"
					
					 The participants shouted "Let's win the basic right to labor by abolishing evil labor laws!" stirring up the atmosphere of the struggle.
					
					 That day the fascist authorities let more than 80 companies of police forces encircle the venue of the rally, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Studied in Nigeria, Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Studied in Nigeria, Nepal
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's works were held in Nigeria and Nepal on June 21 and 24.
					 At the seminars explanations were made on his congratulatory speech at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union organizations for celebrating the 66th KCU anniversary and his work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche". 
					
					 The explanations were followed by speeches.
					
					 Abdullahi Muhammad Yamma, chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies, and other speakers highly appreciated Kim Jong Un's noble view on the rising generation and the future.
					
					 Recalling he said in his speech the KCU members are treasures more valuable than billions of tons of gold and represent the hope and future, they said his remarks taught the world progressive people the viewpoint and stance on the children.
					
					 Such promise to hand down to the KCU members a thriving socialist country best in the world can be made only by a man with ardent love for the rising generation, they said.
					
					 A member of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) said that his work mirrors his strong revolutionary sense of obligation and firm will to successfully carry forward the revolutionary cause started and developed by the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Guinean People Laud Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Life
articles.content:
Guinean People Laud Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Life
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Lecture were given by the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea and Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University on June 18 and 25 to commemorate the 18th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's demise.
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Conakry study group, in his lecture said Kim Il Sung's life will always be kept in the memory of the Korean people for the great feats he performed for the people all his life.
					
					 The Juche idea founded by him and the people's revolutionary government he set up in the guerilla base during the anti-Japanese armed struggle were all based on his love for and trust in the people.
					
					 Right after the liberation of the country from the Japanese colonial rule, he, out of his mission to devotedly work for the people as their son, carried out an agrarian reform to realize the centuries-old desire of the peasants.
					
					 It was thanks to his noble idea of putting the people above anything else that free educational and medical systems were introduced and the tax system totally abolished in the DPRK.
					
					 Mohamed Diouhe Fofana, chairman of the Kankan University study group, said Kim Il Sung's was a life wholly dedicated to the country and people.
					
					 Kim Il Sung made sure that the party, army and government represent the people's will, demand and interests and built a unique socialist system centered on the popular masses, he said, adding:
					
					 He was always busy working for the country and people.
					
					 He passed away in his office room while working day and night even in the last days of his great life for the happiness of the people and the reunification of the country.
					
					 His field guidance tours reached every nook and corner of the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A joint seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show were held in UK, lecture meeting in Guinea and seminar in Uganda from June 19 to 23.
					
					 Seen at the venues were photos showing feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing the Korean people's efforts for building a thriving nation.
					
					 DPRK film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" was screened at the film show.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in UK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Introduced in Bangladeshi Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Introduced in Bangladeshi Bulletin
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Bangladeshi organizations introduced the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung in their bulletins on June 26 and 28.
					 The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy in its article titled "Life for the People" said:
					
					 The Korean people and the world revolutionary people are deeply admiring the great man who made the history of love for the people regarding believing in the people as in Heaven as his lifelong motto.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung suffered from all kinds of hardships all his life to provide the people with pleasure and happiness.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the Korean people built an industrial country with their own efforts though everything was destroyed in the Korean War and worked epoch-making miracles in each period and at each stage of the revolution and construction.
					
					 His motto was to build a state the masters of which were the popular masses.
					
					 The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea said in an article entitled "Immortal Feats for National Reunification" that Kim Il Sung performed undying feats for national unity and reunification, adding:
					
					 He encouraged all the Koreans to the struggle for the country's reunification regardless of their residence, differences of idea, political viewpoint, grouping, religious belief and political background.
					
					 He, who made efforts for the country and the nation, worked heart and soul to build a reunified country for all the Koreans until the last moments of his life.

articles.title: Korea's Reunification-related Monuments Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Korea's Reunification-related Monuments Introduced by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 24 posted an article on its Internet website to mark the 40th anniversary of the July 4 Joint Statement adopted between the north and the south of Korea.
					 The article titled "Monument to President Kim Il Sung's signature on national reunification" said:
					
					 There is a monument to President Kim Il Sung's signature on national reunification in Panmunjom, Kaesong City in the central part of the Korean Peninsula. The President put forward many proposals for reunification and led the whole Korean nation to the struggle for reunification. He left the last autograph in his life reading            "Kim Il Sung, July 7, 1994" on a document related to the north-south highest-level talks.
					
					 The Korean people erected the monument in order to convey his desire for reunification for all ages.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, who visited Panmunjom in November 1996, underscored the need to reunify the country without fail as desired by the President.
					
					 The website gave a detailed account of the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower. It also introduced the United Front Tower on Ssuk Islet in Pyongyang.
					
					 The monuments are giving the people conviction and optimism about the bright future of Korea's reunification and powerfully encouraging the whole Korean nation to the struggle for national reunification, it added.

articles.title: U.S., Japan and S. Korea's Moves against DPRK Censured by Ukrainian Organization
articles.content:
U.S., Japan and S. Korea's Moves against DPRK Censured by Ukrainian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in a statement on June 24 denounced the U.S., Japan and the south Korean authorities' moves against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. is now becoming undisguised in its moves for arms buildup against the DPRK and aggravating the tension on the Korean Peninsula while staging joint military exercises in league with the Japanese reactionaries and the south Korean puppet group, the statement said.
					
					 The U.S. hostile act is contrary to the aspiration of the Korean people and the world people, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The Japanese militarists are going to dispatch aggressor forces to south Korea in an attempt to legalize overseas dispatch of the "Self-Defense Forces" which is prohibited by the constitution.
					
					 The statement condemned the treacheries of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for trampling down the desire of the nation for reunification, kowtowing to its masters, the U.S. and Japan, and resorting to the moves against the DPRK and reunification.
					
					 No matter how desperately the enemies of the DPRK may try, they can never realize their ambition, it stressed.
					
					 Those who seek to ignite a war should clearly know that any aggression plan will be foiled by the Korean People's Army, possessed of high military capacities and closely united with the people, it warned.

articles.title: Pyongyang Circus Introduced by ITAR-TASS
articles.content:
Pyongyang Circus Introduced by ITAR-TASS
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS of Russia on June 29 introduced the Pyongyang Circus.
					 The Pyongyang Circus founded in June 1952 during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War has registered great achievements in many international acrobatics festivals, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Spectators of foreign countries used to applaud stunts of DPRK acrobats flying like birds, skills of jugglers and comic acrobats exciting laughter. 
					
					 A grand magic was performed successfully at May Day Stadium in Pyongyang last year and prominent figures of various countries enjoyed it.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Bangladeshi Political Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Bangladeshi Political Figures
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Political figures of Bangladesh issued statements on June 26 and 28 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, said:
					
					 We are deeply recollecting the undying feats Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people and the world progressive people, performed in achieving the human cause of independence on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of his demise. He was a distinguished thinker and theoretician who founded the immortal Juche idea and clearly indicated the way of the era and revolution. He was a legendary hero who hewed out the Korean revolution with arms and saved the destiny of the country and the nation and an invincible and iron-willed commander who opened up a new era of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, noted:
					
					 Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the people till the last moment of his life since he embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years. He is immortal in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressive people. This would be unthinkable without his great feats and noble traits. The feats he performed for the Korean revolution and global independence will shine long.

articles.title: U.S. Should Stop Anti-DPRK Provocation Moves: Belarusian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Should Stop Anti-DPRK Provocation Moves: Belarusian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Belarus February 16 Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Songun Politics issued a statement on June 25 to condemn the U.S. for its war provocation moves against the DPRK.
					 The statement said: 
					
					 The U.S. is threatening the DPRK while strengthening its military muscle in south Korea and ceaselessly staging military exercises for aggression. This is arousing deep concerns of the international community.
					
					 Peace should be defended on the Korean Peninsula and provocation of the aggressors be curbed at once.
					
					 We will support the brave Korean people in their struggle to defend sovereignty under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once provocation moves and apologize to the DPRK. 
					
					 We call upon the world progressives to invigorate the struggle against the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: Ecuadorian Organization Supports DPRK's Stand to Bolster Up Self-Defensive Nuclear Deterrent
articles.content:
Ecuadorian Organization Supports DPRK's Stand to Bolster Up Self-Defensive Nuclear Deterrent
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador issued a statement on June 26 to denounce the U.S. and the south Korean regime for violating the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK again.
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea, in league with the south Korean puppet army, staged largest joint live-fire drill in the area south of the Demilitarized Zone, kicking up the reckless racket of firing at the dignified DPRK flag, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This is a vivid expression of their hostile policy toward the DPRK and an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the sovereign state. It is also a reckless act of escalating confrontation and danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, the most acute hotspot in the world.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique should admit the gravity of the situation and apologize to the DPRK. We bitterly denounce their provocative act and positively support the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry which declared it would bolster up nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 The Ecuadorian people extend warm and fraternal greetings and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to reunify the country independently and peacefully.

articles.title: Spokesman for Chinese FM Refers to Attempt to Conclude Military Agreement between S. Korea and Japan
articles.content:
Chinese FM Spokesman Refers to Attempt to Conclude Military Agreement between S. Korea, Japan
 Beijing, July 2 (KCNA) -- Hong Lei, spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry, at a regular press briefing on June 29 referred to the attempt to conclude the General Security of Military Information Agreement (GSOMIA) between south Korea and Japan.
					 This attempt is not helpful to settling the relevant issue of the Korean Peninsula, he noted, adding that dialogue and negotiations are the only effective ways for settling it.
					
					 He hoped each side concerned would prudently behave and do more things helpful to the regional peace and stability as the situation in the peninsula is complicated and sensitive.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Cooperation in Missile Shield Will Spark Off New Arms Race: Chinese Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Cooperation in Missile Shield Will Spark Off New Arms Race: Chinese Newspaper 
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Chinese newspaper Liberation Army Daily on June 29 carried an article as regards the decision of the U.S. and south Korea to cooperate in the missile shield under the pretext of coping with the "growing missile threat from north Korea". 
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. secretaries of State and Defense and their south Korean counterparts agreed to strengthen comprehensive and combined defense posture against the "threat of ballistic missiles from north Korea" at the second "two-plus-two" security talks held in Washington in mid June. Their real purpose is to coordinate the missile defense system established by south Korea and U.S. forces in south Korea independently. 
					
					 This move means that the U.S.-south Korea military alliance shows a new trend of development and seriously affects the future security structure in Northeast Asia and the whole of the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					  In June 2009, the U.S. promised south Korea to provide "extended deterrence" for the first time. This specifically involves nuclear umbrella, conventional weapons and missile shield. 
					
					 In March this year the U.S. assistant secretary of Defense clarified the will to deploy regional anti-ballistic missile shields in Asia and Mideast. 
					
					 The coordination of the U.S. and south Korean missile shields would signify a step forward not only in carrying out "the U.S. strategy for extended deterrence" but in building a missile shield in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 U.S. Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta said the U.S. would increase its troops to be deployed in Asia in a couple of years to come and bolster the deployment of high-tech weapons in the region as its new strategy is focused on it.
					
					 Fresh cooperation between the U.S. and south Korea in the field of missile defense will inevitably arouse concern of outside world for its baneful impact.
					
					 This cooperation will not only increase the complexity of the issue of security and nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula but cause the proliferation of missile defense technology, thus adversely affecting the international control of armament and prospect of disarmament.
					
					 It will, at the same time, deepen the strategic concern among the regional states and even trigger off another regional arms race. 
					
					 This will evidently have an unpredictably baneful impact on the establishment of a multilateral security mechanism in Northeast Asia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Medias y Almacen para Ninos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Medias y Almacen para Ninos
						
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang y el Almacen para Ninos.
					El estuvo primero en la Fabrica de Medias de Pyongyang, base de gran capacidad productiva que cuenta con equipos ultramodernos.
					
					La fabrica fue visitada por el Dirigente           Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un el 10 de diciembre de 2010.
					
					En esa ocasion el Dirigente asigno la tarea de duplicar la capacidad de produccion de 10 millones a 20 millones de pares de medias.
					
					Para cumplirla, los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica reconstruyeron modernamente al lado del taller de medias de la mujer el otro para el hombre y lo pusieron en funcionamiento.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Se detuvo ante la foto de Kim Jong Il realizando la visita de orientacion sobre la fabrica y recordo con gran emocion aquel dia en que le acompano.
					
					Subrayo que el Dirigente prestaba especial atencion a la fabrica y se habria alegrado mas que nadie si hubiese podido escuchar el parte sobre el incremento de la capacidad de produccion.
					
					Dando vueltas por el taller de medias de la mujer y el otro nuevo para el hombre, se informo en detalles de la dotacion tecnica y el estado de produccion.
					
					Al examinar la elasticidad de las medias hechas en la fabrica, evaluo la calidad diciendo que ellas se pegarian bien al tobillo.
					
					Calificando de buenas las especificaciones de la maquina empaquetadora hecha por cuenta propia en la fabrica, aprecio el exito de su inventor Jo Su Gyong, investigador de la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang.
					
					Viendo la marca "Choljuk", dijo que son muy importantes el embalaje y la marca y estos factores aumentan el valor de mercancias. 
					
					Agrego que en el sector de bellas artes industriales deben trabajar con constancia para disenar bien las marcas.
					
					En la sala de muestras vio las medias de diferentes colores y variedades y dijo satisfecho que el pueblo se pondria contento cuando las use.
					
					Cuando distinguio las medias para ninos, instruyo hacer sus marcas con los dibujos favoritos de la poblacion infantil.
					
					Encomendo a los funcionarios y obreros que no olvidaran las huellas de abnegacion dejadas en esta fabrica por el Dirigente y lograran grandes exitos en la produccion para suministrar al pueblo mucho mas medias de mejor calidad.
					
					Recalco que para producir mas articulos con poca mano de obra, hay que eliminar los trabajos manuales de obreros. 
					
					Resalto la importancia de automatizar los procesos hasta hacerlos teledirigidos y ubicar racionalmente la mano de obra para seguir ampliando los exitos de produccion.
					
					Acto seguido, Kim Jong Un visito el Almacen para Ninos.
					
					Recorrio varios puntos del Almacen desde su primer piso hasta el tercero averiguando destalladamente las variedades y la calidad de mercancias y el plan de servicios.
					
					En el mostrador de utilidades escolares, examino minuciosamente la calidad de creyon, boligrafo y portaminas, el papel para pintura, libretas y otros articulos y dio valiosas instrucciones para producir y suministrar mayor cantidad de esos productos.
					
					Pregunto donde se ha hecho la bicicleta para ninos y al ver las pelotas colgadas de la pared del mostrador, enseno que hay colocarlas en los cestos para el confort de los ninos.
					
					Viendo los equipos de juego de diversos generos instalados en el area de diversion bajo techo, senalo sonriendo que no solo los ninos sino los adultos acompanantes tambien visitarian primero este lugar cuando vengan al almacen.
					
					En el segundo piso, destaco que hay que distribuir adecuadamente los mostradores tomando en cuenta las caracteristicas del almacen para los ninos y aconsejo que instalen el puesto de juguetes que contribuyan al desarrollo intelectual de los ninos como crucigrama de pinturas.
					
					En el mostrador de ropas interiores y vestimentas multicolores, enfatizo que lo mas importante no es la exhibicion sino producir y proveer continuamente de esas mercancias.
					
					Averiguo detalladamente la elegancia y la calidad de botas impermeables y otros calzados infantiles e instruyo el metodo de anotacion de tallas.
					
					Examinando las mercancias exhibidas en los mostradores de juguetes moviles, hebillas de marca Cosmos, equipos deportivos y flores, indico los problemas que se presentan para mejorar la calidad, forma, color y otros indices de ellas a las alturas del nuevo siglo.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Jang Song Thaek, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Pak Pong Ju, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Ryang Chong Song, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Texto integro de rueda de prensa concedida por Pak Jong Suk (4)
articles.content:
Texto integro de rueda de prensa concedida por Pak Jong Suk (4)
						
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ACNC) -- En la conferencia de prensa concedida el 28 de junio con los medios nacionales y extranjeros, Pak Jong Suk, quien volvio a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desde el Sur de Corea adonde habia sido raptada y llevada, puso al desnudo la verdad de la campana anti-RPDC que libran los titeres surcoreanos con el tema de los "fugitivos norcoreanos" y conto la situacion miserable de estos.
					Actualmente, la banda de titeres surcoreanos emplea a los "fugitivos norcoreanos" en su campana anti-RPDC en el campo de DDHH, comienza ella y prosigue:
					
					Los tipejos presentados por los titeres son  escorias humanas que guardan rencor del regimen de la RPDC o profugos que salieron ilegalmente del pais.
					
					Para congraciarse con la banda de conservadores y ganarse una suma miserable de dinero, esa chusma toma parte activa en la ofensiva anti-RPDC.
					
					La banda de traidores surcoreanos esta movilizando todos los instrumentos y metodos en la demagogia que incita la confrontacion con la RPDC.
					
					Tras seducir a esos "fugitivos" con el dinero utilizando el nombre de "entidades de cruz roja" y "servidores voluntarios", les instiga a calumniar a la RPDC y elogiar la sociedad surcoreana y sostener las manifestaciones gritando las consignas de esa indole.
					
					Muchas personas no quieren ser actores de ese complot acompanado de mentiras y fraudes. Por eso, se inventan las maneras de movilizarlas con el dinero.
					
					Un dia, los medios de prensa del Sur de Corea reportaron bajo grandes titulares que los "fugitivos norcoreanos" fueron secuestrados en China y llevados al Norte de Corea.
					
					Despues, se conocio que los hombres mencionados en esa demagogia fueron los que emigraron a otros paises impotentes de ganarse la vida en suelo surcoreano o murieron.
					
					Pregunte a varias personas porque vinieron al Sur de Corea. 
					
					Ellos me contaron varios motivos, tales como por el dinero, la amenaza y la mujer.
					
					De verdad, la pandilla de Lee Myung Bak es violadora flagrante de DDHH.
					
					Hoy en dia, ella sigue hablando del problema de "fugitivos norcoreanos" y anda con desesperacion para manchar la imagen de la RPDC por conducto de las escorias humanas, pero, esto no pasa de ser una tonteria.

articles.title: Se conmemora 40o aniversario de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio
articles.content:
Se conmemora 40o aniversario de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio
						
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ACNC) -- Ya transcurrieron 40 anos desde la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio aprobada entre ambas partes coreanas.
					Con motivo de ese dia, la nacion coreana rinde homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung quien dirigio a la victoria la causa de reunificacion de la patria con su destacada idea y extraordinaria orientacion.
					
					En la decada de 1970, presento la orientacion para las amplias negociaciones intercoreanas y los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, o sea, la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional.
					
					Bajo su direccion entusiasta, se prepararon las conversaciones politicas de alto rango entre el Norte y el Sur y se quedo publicada el 4 de julio del 61 (1972) de la Era Juche la susodicha declaracion fundamentada en los referidos tres principios.
					
					Este hecho devino un acontecimiento que preparo a todos los connacionales el programa comun de reunificacion y dejo abierto el momento de nuevo viraje en el movimiento por la reunificacion.
					
					Los tres principios reflejan correctamente la aspiracion independiente y la demanda de la nacion e indican la via de reunificacion del pais.
					
					Durante varias decadas, esos principios recibieron el apoyo absoluto de todos los coreanos por su justeza y vitalidad.
					
					Ellos estan materializados en la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera, engendradas gracias al proposito patriotico y destacada guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", nucleo de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, deviene el de la independencia y unidad nacionales y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre senala el camino del mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, la paz y la prosperidad segun el espiritu de ese ideal.
					
					En virtud de esos documentos, el Norte y el Sur de Corea pudieron acoger la nueva epoca de  reunificacion independiente, la del 15 de Junio, recurriendo a la reconciliacion y la unidad y rechazando la hostilidad y la confrontacion.
					
					Todos los connacionales del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar cumpliran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria siguiendo la ruta indicada por el programa comun sobre esta cuestion.

articles.title: ACNC critica acciones en contra de Declaracion Conjunta de 4 de Julio
articles.content:
ACNC critica acciones en contra de Declaracion Conjunta de 4 de Julio
						
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ACNC) -- La banda de Lee Myung Bak es la horda anti-reunificacion que frustro totalmente el programa comun de la nacion coreana para la reunificacion.
					Al principio de su mandato, ella hablo de la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, pero esa promesa fue embuste y engano.
					
					En su mandato, llevo a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas desafiando a los 3 Principios de la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional estipulados en la historica declaracion arriba mencionada y las posteriores declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					El problema de reunificacion de la patria es asunto interno de la nacion coreana que excluye la intervencion de cualesquier fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					La banda del traidor Lee, desde el primer tiempo de su mandato, tomo el camino de la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras opuesto al principio de independencia.
					
					Considerando las relaciones intercoreanas como las diplomaticas, tomo la ejecucion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. como nucleo de la "diplomacia sobre el Norte (de Corea)" y la "politica sobre este".
					
					Disminuyo en gran escala la facultad del Ministerio de Reunificacion a cargo de las relaciones con el Norte y amplio la del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio.
					
					Asigno a las figuras conflictivas en las jefaturas de aquellos ministerios y las incito a cometer los actos anti-reunificacion consultando previamente con EE.UU. y Japon los asuntos que se presentan en las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Nego el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio para realizar el intercambio multilateral y fomentar el entendimiento entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Disparateando que "esta dispuesto a dejar congeladas las relaciones intercoreanas hasta el final de su mandato", nego totalmente el mejoramiento de estas relaciones.
					
					Calumnio la amplia propuesta de negociaciones de la RPDC diciendo que "no se ve la sinceridad" y "esta puede ser una tactica" e impidio totalmente la cooperacion humanitaria.
					
					Al ofender el sistema de la RPDC violando los acuerdos y compromisos Norte-Sur, recurrio la campana de enfrentar los regimenes de ambas partes.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de hacer frente al supuesto "estado de emergencia", libra casi todos los dias los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC e invento la tremenda farsa como el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana asi como intensifica mas las maquinaciones de confrontacion fratricida diciendo el "castigo" y la "venganza".
					
					La horda de Lee perpetro el acto antietico que hirio doblemente a sus connacionales enlutados por la perdida del padre de la nacion y ofendio hasta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Los crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion perpetrados por la banda de Lee negando totalmente el programa comun y las declaraciones por la reunificacion son peores que los cometidos por los dictadores fascistas antecesores.
					
					Dejando intactas a la banda de Lee y las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, no se puede realizar jamas el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas ni la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo de la nacion coreana.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debera liquidar a la horda de traidores con las fuerzas unidas y cumplir la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.
